== Integrate SpellCode into the Visual Studio IDE ==

Please follow the below mentioned steps to add SpellCode to the Microsoft Visual Studio IDE as an external tools.

1. Open the Microsoft Visual Studio IDE <BR>
2. Click _Tools_ > _External Tools..._ menu item <BR>
3. Press "_Add_" button <BR>
4. Specify the following parameters, <BR>

    * *Title* : SpellCode
    * *Command* : specify the full filename and the path to the spellcode.exe file 
    * *Arguments* : "$(ProjectDir)" 1
     (In here 1 indicates the C++ programming language, you can specify any value from 1 to 11, and it depends on your default programming language) <BR>
5. Press "_OK_" button.
